DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying medical record collect questionnaire patient enrol child clinical trial acute lymphoblastic leukemia may help doctor learn long-term effect treatment plan best treatment . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study long-term outcome patient acute lymphoblastic leukemia enrol child clinical trial EORTC-58741 , EORTC-58831 , EORTC-58832 , EORTC-58881 1971 1998 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Long-Term Outcomes Patients With Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia Who Were Enrolled Children Clinical Trials EORTC-58741 , EORTC-58831 , EORTC-58832 , EORTC-58881 Between 1971 1998
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To assess long-term outcome ( i.e. , long-term survival , long-term disease status , occurrence late adverse effect , occurrence second cancer , socioeconomic status survivor ) patient acute lymphoblastic leukemia previously enrol child clinical trial EORTC-58741 , EORTC-58831 , EORTC-58832 , EORTC-58881 year 1971 1998 . OUTLINE : Long-term outcome data collect database clinical trial EORTC-58741 , EORTC-58831 , EORTC-58832 , EORTC-58881 . Other data collect include patient 's vital status actualization ( e.g. , alive , dead lose follow , date last known alive date death ) , medical record data , collection data patient confirm alive ( e.g. , data relate marital status , education , work , insurance , puberty , fertility , offspring ) questionnaire .
